A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Probably my least favorite Star Wars. 
Visually stunning but oh my god what an insult to a franchise\, especially on Disney's part who had been telling us all that this was going to be better than empire.  
I am also sick of people telling me I don't like this movie because I don't want Women lead or diversity. That is so far from the truth it is ridiculous. 
I don't like the film because the plot is awful\, I couldn't give a toss about any of the characters and it was ridiculously anti-climatic\,
Seriously is almost a carbon copy of Batman vs Superman\, which I literally thought could ever happen again.
